mapper.select:
select count(m.id) from V7_SALARY m
1=1
and m.v7_s_mnum like '%${v7SNum}%'
and m.v7_s_name like '%${v7SName}%'
and m.v7_s_month = #{v7SMonth}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO V7_SALARY ( id, v7_s_month, v7_s_mnum, v7_s_name, v7_s_position, v7_s_base_salary, v7_s_pre_salary, v7_s_out_salary, v7_s_trans_salary, v7_s_charge_salary, v7_s_reality_salary, v7_s_status ) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.v7SMonth}, #{item.v7SMnum}, #{item.v7SName}, #{item.v7SPosition}, #{item.v7SBaseSalary}, #{item.v7SPreSalary}, #{item.v7SOutSalary}, #{item.v7STransSalary}, #{item.v7SChargeSalary}, #{item.v7SRealitySalary}, #{item.v7SStatus})
mapper.sql: id, v7_s_month, v7_s_mnum, v7_s_name, v7_s_position, v7_s_base_salary, v7_s_pre_salary, v7_s_out_salary, v7_s_trans_salary, v7_s_charge_salary, v7_s_reality_salary, v7_s_status, extends1, extends2, extends3, extends4, extends5
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from V7_SALARY
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into V7_SALARY (id, v7_s_month, v7_s_mnum, v7_s_name, v7_s_position, v7_s_base_salary, v7_s_pre_salary, v7_s_out_salary, v7_s_trans_salary, v7_s_charge_salary, v7_s_reality_salary, v7_s_status, extends1, extends2, extends3, extends4, extends5) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{v7SMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{v7SMnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{v7SName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{v7SPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{v7SBaseSalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{v7SPreSalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{v7SOutSalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{v7STransSalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{v7SChargeSalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{v7SRealitySalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{v7SStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{extends1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extends2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extends3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extends4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extends5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
